messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the typical gathering size of smaller bats common to the United States?
up to 50,000 individuals

What is the average damage bonus for a Large bat?

How many attacks can a Large bat make per round?

What is the movement speed of a Large bat?
1 / 12 flying

What happens to the Size of a group of Vampire Bats when they attack?
Increases by 10
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How does the damage dice size change for each extra bat in a group?
Increases by 1

What is the average damage bonus for a Vampire Bat?

1 / 12 flying

What is the average damage bonus for a Vampire Bat?

How many attacks does a Vampire Bat have per round?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the armor of a Vampire Bat?
None
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the skill of Spot Hidden for a Vampire Bat?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the number of bats each time the target beats the bats in a Fighting roll?
The number of bats is reduced by one.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the damage inflicted by a group of 6 bats in a Fighting roll?
1D6 damage
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the Dodge percentage of a Vampire Bat?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What ability do all birds have to affect an attacker's chance to hit?
They can cut an attacker's chance to hit in half (one penalty die to hit) while they are flying.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of birds can only attack helpless prey of any sort?
Vultures
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where do giant birds primarily live?
The western hemisphere
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is a notable characteristic of giant birds that affect their attackers?
All birds can cut an attacker's chance to hit in half
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the average damage bonus for a giant bird?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where do giant birds typically perch?
On rocky ledges, or in trees that have grown close enough to support their considerable weight.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the range of giant birds in the western hemisphere?
The western hemisphere
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where can giant birds only walk?
Anywhere this side of Antarctica
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the damage bonus for giant birds?
